title: Travel Policy
content: Travel allowance for Grade A officers is Rs. 12 per km. Grade B officers receive Rs. 8 per km.

title: Leave Policy
content: Employees are entitled to 12 days of casual leave per year and 10 days of medical leave.

title: Reimbursement Policy
content: Employees can claim reimbursement for official expenses by submitting valid receipts within 15 days.

title: Work From Home Policy
content: Work from home may be approved for up to 2 days per week based on managerial discretion.
